original_text: And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.
korean_text: 만일 누구든지 이 두루마리의 예언의 말씀에서 제하여 버리면 하나님이 이 두루마리에 기록된 생명나무와 및 거룩한 성에 참여함을 제하여 버리시리라

sentences.original_text: And if any man shall take away
from the words of the book of this prophecy
God shall take away his part
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 부분을 빼앗아 가실 것이며

sentences.original_text: out of the book of life
and out of the holy city
which are written in this book
